titles.title: Honoring the service and accomplishments of Kingston Smith, Republican Staff Director and Chief Counsel for the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 11/18/2010--Introduced. Honors Kingston Smith for his service of over 26 years on the occasion of his retirement from the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Commends him for his dedication and commitment to serving his fellow veterans. Recognizes the tremendous dedication and fortitude with which he has led an exemplary career in public service, having balanced his time in the Air Force Reserve with the demanding duties of his roles as husband and father.
